description:
Shimmer provides ADHD coaching to people with ADHD or executive function challenges. Shimmer was born from a group of ADHD coaches, psychiatrists, doctors, and engineers to create a personalized, action-oriented playground for you and your coach to explore. We're not another list, calendar, or app: we're real human interactions paired with expert strategies, so that you can make real changes in your life. Come check us out!

Our ADHD coaches partner with you to co-design a plan to achieve your goals. You'll experiment with strategies on a weekly basis to implement a routine fit specifically for you. Our program has been designed off science-backed methods in partnership with NYU, UC Berkeley, and UCSF. 

Get your free ADHD Mastery Score > https://www.shimmer.care/assessment

## Your ADHD Support System
At Shimmer, ADHD is a lot more than a disability. It extends from self acceptance, to personal discovery of strengths, to each small-but-mighty daily win. Here’s how you’ll move towards your goals.
### 1:1 Coaching Sessions
Meet weekly with your ADHD coach, who gets you—your struggles, your potential, your personal journey. Your coach will cheer you on, keep you accountable to your actions, and celebrate your wins.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd53aee74de0344a4307aad/67ad5abcbbedaec72b9cd3dd_features-video-calls.jpg)
### Tools to Maintain Habits
ADHD is not just about knowing, it’s about consistent doing. Set goals, tag actions to them, attend body doubling sessions with the community, and celebrate successes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd53aee74de0344a4307aad/67ad5abbb934e538f4baed2d_features-actions.jpg)
### Resources for Growth
Whether you’re newly diagnosed or a seasoned expert, explore science-backed learning modules spanning from the neuroscience of ADHD, to navigating relationships, to building habits.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd53aee74de0344a4307aad/6561320d45033320605a3f49_how-to-3-new.png)
### Stay in Touch
Whether you're stuck on a next step, celebrating a win, or just need a fresh perspective, shoot over a quick message and they'll address it in your next call and support via text.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd53aee74de0344a4307aad/67ad59f26db5debdfdf41ddb_features-chat.avif)

What is ADHD coaching & how does it work at Shimmer?
Shimmer’s ADHD coaching is about making actionable changes in your life. We help you achieve improvements across various domains of your life, specifically addressing ADHD-related challenges. Our solution-focused, health coaching model emphasizes observable actions and behaviors, not just adding more theory or knowledge. Shimmer’s ADHD Coaching Program targets key dimensions essential for individuals with ADHD, based on our Shimmer ADHD Mastery Framework:- **Time:** Handling the past, present, and future effectively- **Done:** Starting, following through, and finishing tasks- **Pause:** Managing emotions and maintaining balanceOur evidence-based coaching program was designed by leading ADHD experts from NYU, Mount Sinai, and other top academic and coaching institutions. Our ADHD coaches collaborate with you to co-design a personalized plan to help you reach your goals. Together, you'll experiment with strategies weekly, building a routine tailored to your needs.Each coach-member partnership begins with vision and goal setting, followed by a weekly cycle of experimentation and reflection. This process includes:- Weekly coaching sessions with real-human guidance and accountability- Guidance through the experimentation and reflection process to make changes in your life- Access to community features and events like daily body doubling sessions- Accountability tools built for ADHD brains‍
What kind of time commitment do I have to make?
Shimmer is designed to fit into your schedule — not the other way around. Your coach will design and schedule your tasks based on what's realistic for you and can make changes during the week to accommodate your busy life.
Can I use my HSA, FSA or HRA to expense Shimmer?
Yes you can! We are HSA/FSA/HRA-eligible. This means if you have a **Health Savings Account** , **Flexible Savings Account** , or **Health Reimbursement Arrangement** with your employer, you can pay for Shimmer using your card from one of these accounts. You can also submit our invoices for reimbursement to your provider if you forget to use the card provided by them for your subscription.Some providers may require you to submit a letter of necessity for this expense, please reach out to us at support@shimmer.care if you need any help with getting your subscription reimbursed by your HSA/FSA/HRA provider!
How do I become a Shimmer ADHD Coach?
We’re so glad you’re interested! We’re looking for licensed coaches (ICF or NBHWC preferred) specializing in ADHD. Shimmer coaches are passionate to help others, kind & empathetic, and most of us are living with ADHD ourselves. If you're interested in joining the coaching team, [check out this page](https://shimmer.care/</coaches>), fill out the application, and we'll reach out if it good fit!
Can I reschedule or cancel a session?
We understand that life doesn't always go according to plan. Shimmer members can cancel or reschedule a coaching video call without penalty 24 hours in advance. If cancellation is within 24 hours, the session will be forfeited for the week. Thank you for your understanding!
Do you offer couples coaching or family coaching?
At this time, Shimmer only offers 1:1 individual coaching, but we are looking to expand our services in the future!
